1.content:
Alex Mullner

Alex loves sports and hanging out at the beach. He is quite arrogant and brags to everyone that he is going to be a professional athlete. Is his cockiness just a facade to mask his crushing self-doubt? Is he using his sports dream to fill the void left by the disappearance of his parents? Or is he just a brazen youth trying to “look cool?" Since his mom, Clara, died Alex lives with his Grandparents, George and Evelyn. He is friends with Haley. He is somewhere between 17 - 19 years old.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2e5bYaB


Elliot

Elliott lives alone in a cabin on the beach. He is a writer who dreams of one day writing a magnificent novel. He is a sentimental “romantic” with a tendency to go off onto flowery, poetic tangents. When he can afford it, he enjoys a strong beverage at the saloon. He arrived to Pelican Town only one year prior to the new farmer (an Original Character). He appears to be in his late 20s or early 30s.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2dqzii5


Harvey

Harvey is the town doctor. He’s a little old for a bachelor, but he has a kind heart and a respected position in the community. He lives in a small apartment above the medical clinic, but spends most of his time working. You can sense a sadness about him, as if there’s something he’s not telling you. Harvey is friends with Maru through working together at the clinic. He can be seen standing with Maru at the Luau, and his dialogue at that time suggests that he has a crush on her. Harvey will dance with Maru for the flower dance if not with the player. Harvey is likely in his 40's.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2e5mMn7


Sam

Sam is an outgoing, friendly guy who is brimming with youthful energy. He plays guitar and drums, and wants to start a band with Sebastian as soon as he has enough songs together. However, he does have a habit of starting ambitious projects and not finishing them. Sam is a little stressed about the impending return of his father, who has been away for years serving in the military. Sam is often in his bedroom practicing guitar, or spending time with his friend Sebastian. He works part time at JojaMart as well. He's also often in town playing his handheld video game or at the saloon playing pool. Sam lives with his mother Jodi and younger brother Vincent. He and Sebastian are close friends and often spend time together. Sam is likely between 17 - 19 years old.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2dieF47


Sebastian

Sebastian is a rebellious loner who lives in his parents’ basement. He is Maru’s older half-brother, and feels like his sister gets all the attention and adoration of his mother Robin and step-father Demetrius, while he is left to rot in the dark. Robin sometimes calls him Sebby. He tends to get deeply absorbed in computer games, comic books, and sci-fi novels, and will sometimes spend great lengths of time pursuing these hobbies alone in his room. He can be a bit unfriendly to people he doesn’t know. He holds a lot of anger for his step-father, and the two argue frequently. Sebastian is good friends with Sam. Sebastian is likely between 17 and 19.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2digqOV


Shane

Shane is often rude and unhappy. He works at JojaMart most days under the supervision of his manager, Morris, and after work he frequently spends his evenings in the saloon. He doesn't work on the weekend, and is frequently around the ranch in which he lives with his aunt Marnie and goddaughter Jas. He has a very dim outlook on life and struggles with alcoholism and depression, which he masks with rudeness and hatred. Shane is likely in his early 20's.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2e5psky
1.title: About the Villagers (Bachelors)

11.content:
Maru

Growing up with a carpenter and a scientist for parents, Maru acquired a passion for creating gadgets at a young age. When she isn’t in her room, fiddling with tools and machinery, she sometimes does odd jobs at the local clinic with Harvey. Friendly, outgoing, and ambitious, Maru would be quite a lucky match. She has a strained relationship with her half-brother Sebastian and wishes they were closer. She is also friends with Penny. It's hard to tell her age, but Maru is likely between 15 to 20 years old.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2e5bDFa


Abigail

Abigail lives at the general store with her parents, Pierre and Caroline. She sometimes fights with her mom, who worries about Abigail’s “alternative lifestyle," which involves dying her hair purple. She might be found alone in the graveyard, or maybe out in a rainstorm looking for frogs. She has a strained relationship with her parents. She is friends with Sam and Sebastian, and is likely in her late teens to early 20's.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2ebTZks


Emily

Emily is an aspiring seamstress who lives with her sister Haley, and together they and care for their parents home, who have been traveling the world for the past two years. Her sister is embarrassed by her. She works with Gus, who employs her part time at the saloon. She is also friends with Sandy in Calico Desert. She is likely in her mid to late 20's.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2ebWlQl


Haley

Being wealthy and popular throughout high school has made Haley a little conceited and self-centered. She has a tendency to judge people for superficial reasons. Haley lives with her sister Emily, and together they care for their parents home, who have been traveling the world for the past two years. Haley has a crush on Alex. She is likely between 17 - 19 years old.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2dDjruk


Leah

Leah lives alone in a small cabin just outside of town. She loves to spend time outside, foraging for a wild meal or simply enjoying the gifts of the season. She’s a talented artist with a large portfolio of work… yet she’s too nervous to display it to the public. She has an ex named Kel who bothers here from time to time. She is likely in her early to mid 20's.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2e5cXrj


Penny

Penny lives with her mom, Pam, in a little trailer by the river. While Pam is out carousing at the saloon, Penny quietly tends to her chores in the dim, stuffy room she is forced to call home. She is shy and modest, without any grand ambitions for life other than settling in and starting a family. She likes to cook and read books from the local library, as well as teach Jas and Vincent due to the lack of elementary / primary schools in town. She is likely in her early to mid 20's.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2ehcobO




You will need to step back to the previous chapter to start the story or learn about other villagers and characters.
11.title: About the Villagers (Bachelorettes)

12.content:
George Mullner

George is married to Evelyn and lives with his grandson, Alex. He is an old, balding man with a sour attitude, and is wheel-chair bound. He doesn't care for much of anything, and finds plenty of reason to complain around the clock. He is likely somewhere between 70 - 90 years old.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2ddsuWG


Evelyn Mullner

Evelyn has lived in Pelican Town her entire life. Always hopeful and optimistic, "Granny" spends her days tending the town gardens, baking her signature cookies, and reminiscing about Stardew Valley's vibrant past. She is married to George and houses her grandson, Alex. She is likely somewhere between 70 - 90 years old.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2e5mUD6


Jodi

Jodi is married to Kent and together they have two sons, Sam and Vincent. Caroline is her best friend and she is able to tell her anything. They also attend exercise classes along with some of the other Pelican Town ladies. She is likely in her late 30's to mid 40's.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2dUs6O7


Kent

Kent, for several years (one year as of the arrival of the farmer), is away serving in the army. He sent a letter which is hidden in a drawer in his wife Jodi's bedroom, in which he wrote a letter warning her that he has seen some things and might not be the same when he returns--alluding to that he might have some trauma or PTSD. He has two sons: Vincent and Sam. He has a hard time adjusting to civilian life after so many years of service. He is likely in his late 30's to mid 40's.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2eqjLkD


Robin

Robin is the carpenter of Pelican Town. She is married to Demetrius and lives with her daughter Maru and son Sebastian. Maru is her daughter with Demetrius, and Sebastian is from an earlier relationship. Robin attends exercise classes on Tuesday with the other village ladies. She has two books in her bookshelf titled 'Maximizing Your Second Marriage' and 'Practical Tips For First-Time Step-Dads'. She has a friendly, outgoing, and goofy personality, and enjoys poking fun at others, lightly. She is likely somewhere in her late 30's or early 40's.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2dihzGk


Demetrius

Demetrius is a scientist who is married to Robin and lives with his daughter Maru and step-son Sebastian. Demetrius is actually Robin's second husband, and Sebastian is from Robin's first relationship. He and Sebastian don't get along. He is likely in his 40's or early 50's.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2dRl4ra


Marnie

Marnie is a ranger who lives with her niece Jas and nephew Shane. Though she is heavy, she exercises with some of the other ladies of Pelican Town. Mayor Lewis and Marnie are entangled in a secret relationship. She is likely in her 40's or early 50's.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2eCfIB4


Caroline

Caroline is married to Pierre and lives with her daughter Abigail in Pierre's (a local grocery store). She doesn't approve of much of her daughter's lifestyle. She is likely in her 40's.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2ddtbiF


Pierre

Pierre lives with his wife Caroline and their daughter Abigail behind his shop. He feels threatened by Joja Mart and Morris's attempts to draw his customers away from the store, and worries that he won't be able to make as much money because of this. He has a strained relationship with Abigail due to their different beliefs.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2e17vEF


Pam

Pam lives with her daughter Penny. She spends every evening socializing and drinking at the saloon. She lives rather messily, and her daughter cleans up after her. She is, however, embarrassed by her impoverished state and can lose her temper easily.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2ddufTL




You will need to step back to the previous chapter to start the story or learn about other villagers and characters.
12.title: About the Villagers (Family Members)

13.content:
Jas

Jas lives with her aunt Marnie on her ranch outside town. She's often seen alongside her friend Vincent, who is the only resident of town close to her age. Penny takes time to teach both Vincent and Jas at the museum since there's no school nearby. She is likely between 5 to 8 years old.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2ebXdVo


Vincent

Vincent lives with his mother Jodi and his brother Sam. His father Kent is sometimes away (after he returns from active duty), but also lives with the family when he's in town. He's often seen alongside his friend Jas, who is the only resident of town close to his age. Penny takes time to teach both Vincent and Jas at the museum since there's no school nearby. He also has a crush on his teacher, Penny. He also has a bit of a sweet tooth, and struggles to read well. Vincent is likely between the ages of 6 and 9.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2ddq4Hq


Dusty

Dusty is a fenced-in dog in Pelican Town that glowers at passers by from the darkness of his doghouse / box. The dog is a male, and is large and brown. He seems at ease with Alex around.




You will need to step back to the previous chapter to start the story or learn about other villagers and characters.
13.title: About the Villagers (Children & Animals)

14.content:
Mayor Lewis

Lewis is the mayor of Pelican Town. Lewis is known to have some sort of relations with Marnie, as the shorts he lost are found in her bedroom. As nobody has challenged Lewis for his title of mayor in the twenty years he has held the position, one could assume he has a good relationship with everyone living in Pelican Town. He was apparently good friends with the farmer's grandfather. He has never been married and has no family, all he lives for is being mayor. He sometimes questions if it was worth it. He is likely in his 50s or early 60's.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2e5jUsv


Gus

Gus is a villager who lives and works at the saloon in Pelican Town. He owns the establishment. Gus employs Emily part time to help at the saloon. Pam is also a frequent customer, and can often be seen chatting with Gus. He has intimate knowledge of many of the town's residents, being the local barkeep. He is likely in his late 50's.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2dUzMzQ


Clint

Clint is a villager who lives in Pelican Town. He is running the local Blacksmith. He has a crush on Emily that he is too shy to act on. He is likely in his 30's or early 40's.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2e17zob


Linus

Linus is a villager who lives in a small tent north of Pelican Town near The Mines. He generally considers himself an outcast of the town. He does not trust people, and doesn't seem to consider anyone in town his friend, as to the fact that most people don't treat him well. He tries to stay out of the way. His tent has been destroyed before. Robin doesn't mind him living behind their house, as long as he doesn't bother them. He appears to be in his 50's or so.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2dUyiWC


Sandy

Sandy is a villager who lives in Calico Desert where she runs the store Oasis. She is friends with Emily. She appears to be in her 20's.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2e18Mvm


Willy

Willy is a fisherman who grew up traveling among the Fern Islands and now lives south of Pelican Town on The Beach. He sells bait and fishing supplies in his shop. He appears to be in his late 30's or early 50's. It's hard to tell if the seas have aged him or if time has.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2ec0qnB


M. Rasmodius, Wizard

The Wizard, also known as M. Rasmodius, is a villager who lives in the Wizard's Tower to the far west of Cindersap Forest. He is the father of one of the girls in the village, but will not state who. It is implied that it is Abigail. He is likely in his 40's or 50's.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2dqBF4h


Gunther

Gunther is a villager who operates the Archaeology Center in Pelican Town. He is the go-to-guy for background concerning the purpose of archaeological finds. He is likely in his 50's.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2efEL8V


Marlon

Marlon is a villager who lives in the North East of Pelican Town, in the Adventurer's Guild. He is a weapons enthusiast, and he lost his eye in the mines. He is likely in his late 50's to 60's.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2e8MYMV


Gil

Gil lives in the Adventurer's Guild with Marlon, and is often rocking in a chair near the desk that Marlon works at inside. He is likely in his 60's.
Appearance: http://bit.ly/2ebYZ91


Morris

Morris is a villager who works at JojaMart in Pelican Town. He's the manager and also acts as the customer service representative. He has his sights set on the abandoned community center, wanting to turn it into a JojaMart warehouse. He has a rivalry with Pierre.
Appearance: bit.ly/2e5qA85


Farmer

In the game, the player controls the Farmer. This is an original character of your choosing. They can be any gender. Their story is this: They have been working in a cubicle for quite some time for JojaCorp and have gone stir crazy, when they remember their grandfather left them a letter to open when life got to the point where a change was needed. The letter entrusted this city-dwelling grandchild with inheritance of grandfather's farm in Stardew Valley. The player accepts and goes to start anew with grandfather's fixer-upper of a farm and integrate into small town life.

You will need to step back to the previous chapter to start the story or learn about other villagers and characters.
14.title: About the Villagers (Others)

15.content:
A farmer had moved into the old abandoned farm just west of Pelican Village some time ago, which had the whole town talking. With so few residents, word spread fast. Of course, the world didn't revolve around this newcomer either. There were long-lasting friendships, feuds, and unrequited relationships ever present in the town. The arrival of the newcomer was a distraction at best, but things had been gradually changing. People here kept secrets... both dark and innocent. Some far darker than others.

There was a thread of perverted sadism weaving its way around the town, and something was going to come to a head eventually. At least one person had awoken to nasty desires. Who was it that felt the need to humiliate another?
15.title: The Story Begins!

151.content:
One of the young, single men in the village felt that thread of sadism, and had to act on it, lest he go insane.

Was it Alex, with his arrogant, macho attitude, and his burning desire to prove that he was powerful?

Was it Elliot, venting the frustrations of being unable to successfully achieve a lucrative living as an author?
151.title: One of the bachelors.

1511.content: Alex wasn't exactly renowned for his kindness--at least, not to those he barely knew. He spent so much time working out that he was practically testosterone in human form. He was also self-confident, or some would say arrogant, and he knew he could have anyone he wanted. Who would he go for?
1511.title: Alex

choices: One of the bachelorettes: (Maru, Abigail, Emily, Haley, Leah, Penny)
Another female: (Jodi, Robin, Marnie, Caroline, Pam, Evelyn, Jas, Sandy)
15111.content:
Alex was a red-blooded Pelican Town man. Of course he liked the ladies. There were so many to choose from, and with his raw muscle, strength, and generally confident airs, he could probably score with any woman in the town that he wanted. Of course, none of them knew about his less than typical proclivities; In particular, the fact that he didn't just want to fuck a woman senseless, but he wanted to absolutely dominate and humiliate her, whether she liked it or not. Such things made him feel powerful, and the depravity of his fantasies was more than enough to arouse him.

Up until now, he'd only spent time in the bath house imagining what it might be like if it were at all even remotely socially acceptable to do the sorts of things he wanted to do. He was one sick puppy, and he knew it. He was both proud and ashamed of it, but he was tired of being ashamed. It was time that he finally had his way with a woman in Pelican Town, or at least the greater Stardew Valley area. There were few to choose from, but his mind was set on conquest, and that meant that he didn't necessarily just have to settle for one either.

Now, he just had to consider who he'd make his first victim...
15111.title: Female victims.

151112.content:
Of the ladies around Alex's age, there were relatively slim pickings, but they all were young and ripe for the picking. He could imagine himself violating any of them, really.

Maru had a sort of geeky appeal. She wasn't timid like one might expect of a nerd, however. She was more than confident in her knowledge and expertise in health and nature. If she didn't, she'd make for a pretty terrible nurse. There was something appealing about that nurse aspect of her, though, and she really did seem like the sort who, while confident, was malleable in that aspect, and easy to break. Taking her down a peg would be easy.

Abigail was a bit of a freak. She was nice to just about everyone but her folks, but with them, she had a wild, rebellious streak. She was interested in magic, the occult, and all kinds of kind of nearly gothy things. Her personality didn't really mesh with the way she presented herself physically. Beyond that, she's a bit of a geek. The kind of things she's interested in set her apart from the rest of the villagers, and to Alex, they were frankly a little weird and annoying. Still, punishment would be a fun angle. After all, there was an old saying: The nail that sticks up must be hammered down.

Emily is a cheerful, whimsical girl who seems to jive with nature. She's a little bit on the alternative side, but compared to some of the other eligible peers of Alex's, she's a bit more down to earth. Her optimism is an enticing challenge. She always seems to be smiling. Maybe, just maybe, you could make her see the darker side of nature, and wipe that smile off of her face, while wiping something else entirely onto it. She'd be satisfying to break. Plus, she's Haley's sister, and he's somewhat fond of Haley, while Haley is more than a little hostile towards Emily. Could be a good way to show off.

Haley is probably the most normal and arguably bearable woman in Pelican Town as far as Alex is concerned. She has a clear interest in him, and he could easily fuck her just about whenever he wants, but he's enjoyed playing hard to get for a while. She's a bit of a challenge in that she's incredibly high maintenance, and she does seem to expect Alex to deliver the goods--monetarily and in terms of devotion. He's been playing the game with her for some time, but often thinks of how fun it would be to give her the complete opposite treatment. She wants a man servant for a lover. He secretly wants a slave to use and degrade.

Leah is an artist who spends a lot of time making a lot of art that Alex finds frankly a little pointless. Beyond her art, though, she tends to sort of stay away from him. Different strokes, one could suppose. A while back, she had a partner named Kel who left her, and she's been a little raw since. Even so, she's a strong, independent woman, and she might be worth the chase. If nothing else, she's hot, and she already gets her hands dirty plenty, so why not her face?

Penny is a tragic soul. She's probably by far the easiest to dominate. She's already so submissive, quiet, and sensitive. She works with children, and keeps her nose buried in a book frequently. What's even better is that she's already vastly lower class than Alex. She lives in a shitty trailer with her drunkard mother, who Alex likes to imagine already uses the poor little bitch as a toilet as is. She probably doesn't, of course--all the better, because Alex would love to be the one to cross that line with Penny.

So who will it be?
151112.title: One of the bachelorettes: (Maru, Abigail, Emily...

1511121.content: Alex wants to start small. He wants to start with just one girl, and maybe work up from there, but for now, which of the two will it be? The nerd or the freak?
1511121.title: Maru or Abigail

1511122.content: Alex wants to start small. He wants to start with just one girl, and maybe work up from there, but for now, which of the two sisters will it be? The hippie or the valley girl?
1511122.title: Emily or Haley

1511123.content: Alex wants to start small. He wants to start with just one girl, and maybe work up from there, but for now, which of the two will it be? The sculptor or the poor girl?
1511123.title: Leah or Penny

15112.content: Alex was gonna use his charm to sway the men of Stardew Valley to do whatever he pleased. The question was, who would he? His athleticism could pretty much over power almost anyone in the nearby town, farm, beach, or even forest. So with his ambitions in mind he went to visit:
15112.title: Male victims.

151122.content: It was decided, Alex would go after a fellow village member. The next question was whether they would be male or female.
151122.title: A fellow Villager

1511221.content: Alex decided he would go after another guy, but out of all the Villagers he chose:
1511221.title: Male

1513.content:
Was it Harvey, thirsting for discovery, and hungering for someone to accept him completely, whether they wanted to or not, despite his awkwardness?

How about Sam, needing to fulfill one more act of rebellion that can't be satisfied by his tendency towards skater-boy life, nor his thrashing music?
1513.title: Another bachelor

15133.content:
Perhaps it's Sebastian, feeling the need to turn that angst into power, and to find something he has control over that nobody can take away?

Or maybe it's Shane, who with or without liquid courage seeks to turn his tendency for self-destruction into the tendency to destroy and humiliate others?
15133.title: Another bachelor

152.content:
In this town, the younger single women tended to stray from the antiquated notions of a quiet, demure female. Well, most of them, at least. Of course, that thread of darkness snaking through the streets spared no one. Which of the bachelorettes is overcome with the desire to torture and humiliate another?

Could it be ambitious young Maru, fed up with being caught in the crossfire of aggression and jealousy, deciding to take out a little of her own aggression?

Is it perhaps Abigail, shunned by her own parents and thought of as too eccentric for the sleepy town, tired of grinning and bearing the constant judgment?
152.title: One of the bachelorettes.

choices: She dresses and goes to take a shit in her bathroom
She stays squatting and shoves you up her ass
She shoves you up her ass to digest you
1522.content:
You wake up in a dark place with no idea of where you are or how you got there. You feel around your surroundings to try to figure out where you are.
Suddenly the ground begins to move and you fall backwards as light fills your mysterious chamber. And then you hear a voice. "Hello again Mr. Farmer! Are you ready to play?"
As you look up you're shocked to see the race of Abigail. But what's even more shocking is that you're 8 inches tall and inside a drawyer!
"Oh yeah I forgot to mention, I shrank you with an artifact I found in the mines!" You stare up at Abigail in disbelief and sensing your confusion she speaks. "Oh I bet you're wondering WHY I shrank you. Well it's simple really, everyone in town thinks I'm a weirdo but the truth is I AM a weirdo. I fantasize about shrinking a person and using him as a living dildo, or a toilet slave, and leaving him in my ass all day to digest him. The thought of squeezing a person's remains out of my asshole makes me feel so horny that once I heard an outsider had moved to town I simply couldn't resist any longer. So in short, you're here to become my new ass toy! Just wait a sec, so I can undress before we start.
She starts undressing, and then pulls down her panties revealing a thin patch of purple pubic hair. Once she's fully nude she grabs you and ties your arms and legs together before placing you on her bed. Abigail proceeds to turn around and sprwas her ass cheeks. "Say hi to your new life and home!" The huge globes approach but then Abigail pauses.
"Oh wait! Should I masturbate right now? My other fantasy was throwing a man in a toilet and burying him in my scat."
1522.title: Abigail

1523.content:
What if it's Emily, allowing herself to vent her frustrations about being left alone with her sibling by her parents, having to pick up all the slack?

Or could it be Haley, Emily's sister, lusting to finally make people do exactly what she wants and demonstrate her superiority without holding back?
1523.title: Another bachelorette.

15233.content:
Perhaps it's Leah, frustrated by the constant barraging of her ex, eager to bully rather than be bullied?

Or maybe it's Penny, fed up with the short stick life has handed her, and tired of being a goodie-two shoes if it changes nothing?
15233.title: Another bachelorette.

153.content:
The strain of darkness is creeping into the mind of a more mature man. Someone with years of experience and weariness, whose bitter heart only took a small push to drive him to dominate another.

Is it Mayor Lewis, who seeks affection yet still doesn't find it fulfilling? Perhaps his lust for power goes a little overboard.

Or is it Gus, the town's barkeep, tired of listening to all of the drama of Pelican Town, yearning to shut up his most annoying patrons?
153.title: A non-bachelor male villager.

1533.content:
Maybe it's Clint, working alone for hours in a hot smithy and second-guessing his shyness and lack of balls.

Perhaps it's Linus, stir-crazy in the wild with no one to give him the release and the power that all men need.
1533.title: Another male villager.

15333.content:
Or maybe it's Willy, the fisherman, who often spends time alone obsessing over fish and revolting potential partners? Maybe he'll just take what he wants.

Is it the Wizard. M. Rasmodius, more attuned to the ebb and flow of dark and light desire, all too eager to embrace the darkness and demonstrate his true power?
15333.title: Another male villager.

153333.content:
Maybe it's Gunther, tired of spending all of his time looking over dusty artifacts, wanting rather to bury rather than unbury?

Or perhaps it's the battle-weary Marlon, ready to once again pursue conquest and embrace his might.
153333.title: Another male villager.

1533333.content:
Could it possibly be old Gus, who hardly ever leaves his rocking chair? Is he feeling a sudden rush of sadism?

Or maybe it's Morris, the crooked manager of the local JojaMart, seeking to expand his dominion well past the walls of JojaMart itself?
1533333.title: Another male villager.

15333333.content:
Pierre would never do such a thing, would he? Well, he's under a lot of pressure, with JojaMart trying to put him out of business, and his daughter who he's not even sure is legitimately his is testing him.

Or what about Demetrius, who feels constantly disrespected after being an integral part of a family unit that hardly respects his work for the last decade or two?
15333333.title: Another male villager.

153333333.content:
Perhaps it's Kent after he has returned from the military, haunted by dark and dangerous thoughts, unable to control his aggression and wanting to take out his frustration on something or someone?

Or does old grandpa George have it in him? He's certainly already a mean-spirited old man, but what can he do?
153333333.title: Another male villager.

154.content:
This creeping feeling is washing over the town, but there's nothing supernatural about it. It's just a feeling. A sort of hysteric in the air, and it affects one woman who is mature and old enough to embrace that feeling and act upon it.

Is it Robin, feeling unfulfilled and helpless in her current situation, wanting to put the power back into her own hands?

Or is it Jodi, tired of pining, doting, and tolerating, ready to show someone in the town who's boss?
154.title: A non-bachelorette female villager.

1543.content:
Maybe it's Marnie, sweet at first glance, but stubborn as an ox and ready to use her horns?

Or could it be Caroline, twisted by years of shame and regret, ready to do something about it?
1543.title: Another female villager.

15433.content:
Perhaps the town drunk, slobby old Pam, would be willing to cave to her dark side. The whole town looks down on her, ain't they? Time for them to look up instead.

How about Sandy, from Calico Desert, oft forgotten by her long-distance peers and now at her limit with tolerating the shady work being done at her shop at Oasis?

Or, Yoba forbid, old granny Evelyn? Has she got something up her sleeve?
15433.title: Another female villager.

155.content:
The new addition to Pelican Town--the farmer who took over their grandfather's abandoned old farm, had been making plenty of headway clearing and cleaning the place. It was all they could do to avoid the nastiness of an entire village that was slow to trust them, after all. Perhaps it wasn't worth gaining their trust. Perhaps... it was time to demonstrate some dominion over them. Being from the city and all, it would be easy to do to small folk.

Who goes on a streak of dominance and humiliation?
155.title: Other

choices: John; A huge, hairy, burly lumber-jack type.
Connor; A street-smart hipster who navigated the city with confidence.
Peter; A technical wiz' with a Silicone Valley mindset.
1551.content: That's right, he was from the city, and he didn't need to tolerate any of this. He felt the itch to do something, so he took off his heavy, dirt-covered gloves and tossed them aside, contemplating his first step. Before he picked a victim to go after, however, we'd need to know what sort of guy this was.
1551.title: The new male farmer.

15511.content: What gender is John's victim?
15511.title: John; A huge, hairy, burly lumber-jack type.

15512.content: What gender is Connor's victim?
15512.title: Connor; A street-smart hipster and alleycat.

15513.content: What gender is Peter's victim?
15513.title: Peter; A tech-wiz' with a scheming mind.

choices: Suzanne; A straight-laced, dignified working professional.
Jean; A somewhat petite girl that could pack a punch, being a kickboxer and all.
Danielle: A tall, looming, busty figure whose size rivaled most men.
1552.content:
This newcommer felt angry and humiliated. Not only had she been given her grandfather's farm which was in nothing short of shambles, but she had been treated like trash by the villagers here, for the most part. It was almost tempting to go back to working in a stale cubicle. Almost. But she wasn't one to run. She knew where she came from, and she knew that her intellect and influence was far more than any of the hicks here in country-town. She had been angering herself all day, thinking about the start she'd gotten off to, all while breaking her back and clearing the yard, which she was expected to grow crops for others in, while none of them offered any help.

She'd show them. Perhaps she'd take a victim tonight and show them who was boss. But before that, we need to know who this farmer-woman is.
1552.title: The new female farmer.

15521.content: What gender is Suzanne's victim?
15521.title: Suzanne; A straight-laced, dignified professional.

15522.content: What gender is Jean's victim?
15522.title: Jean; A somewhat petite kickboxer.

15523.content: What gender is Danielle's victim?
15523.title: Danielle: A tall, looming, busty figure.

info.brief_description: The villagers of Stardew Valley get a little... filthy. How? You decide.
info.description:
Stardew Valley is a Harvest Moon-esque game on Steam that features a large cast of interesting, developed characters. Whether you are familiar with them or not, there's a lot of chemistry in the Valley, and there's a lot of dirty fun to be had. This is a primarily filth/fart/scat/ws story, but don't be afraid to let the story flow naturally before... other things start to flow.

This interactive MAY feature:
- Any gender in any dom/sub role
- Farting / Flatulence
- Non-Consent
- Toilet Slavery
- Watersports / Scat
- Rimming / Anal
- Sex
- Cum
- Victim Shrinking / Dom Growth
- Realistic or Unrealistic
- Anal Vore
- Dom Weight Gain
- Bestiality
- Underaged
- Custom Characters

The creator of this interactive requests that use of the following be kept to a minimum if not wholly disregarded:
- Feet
- Armpits
- Sweat
- Pantie Focus
- Child Doms

The creator of this interactive forbids and will delete entries containing:
- Victim Revenge
- Victim Weight Gain / Victim Growth / Dom Shrinking
- Vomit
- Death
- Diapers
- Oral Vore

Original characters are definitely allowed, just be sure to keep them within the parameters asked above. Please, however, do not use cross-over characters from other games or media.

Please use proper spelling and grammar to the best of your abilities, and try to avoid posting unbroken blocks of text. Longer entries should be appropriately split into multiple paragraphs rather than clumped together in just one body of text.
